Field.Name: InternalSubscriberId
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's internal id, for internal use.

Field.Name: SubscriberDomainId
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's domain id, for internal use.

Field.Name: SubscriberDomainName
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's domain.

Field.Name: SubscriberCosId
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's COS id, for internal use.

Field.Name: SubscriberCosName
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's COS which determines the settings and preference of the applications.

Field.Name: ResourceGroupId
Field.Description: Defines the id of the resource group, for internal use.

Field.Name: ResourceGroupName
Field.Description: Defines the name of the resource group.

Field.Name: SystemName
Field.Description: The system name.

Field.Name: SubscriberName
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's full name.

Field.Name: TelephoneNumber
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's MSISDN, which is the subscriber's login ID to the voicemail system.

Field.Name: AlternateNotifEmail
Field.Description: Defines an alternate email address for notification.

Field.Name: Timezone
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's time zone.

Field.Name: GlobalLanguageId
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's language. This setting is stored in ISO string format (en-US) according to RFC 3066, as follows: ISO-639 two letter code; ISO-3166 two letter country code.

Field.Name: InternetPassword
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's Internet login password.

Field.Name: InternetUsername
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's Internet login name.

Field.Name: InternetPwdChangeTime
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's Internet password change time.

Field.Name: InternetPwdFailureTime
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's Internet password failure time.

Field.Name: InternetPwdFailureCounter
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's Internet password failure counter.

Field.Name: HSPassword
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's handset password.

Field.Name: HSPwdChangeTime
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's handset password change time.

Field.Name: HSPwdFailureTime
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's handset password failure time.

Field.Name: HSPwdFailureCounter
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's handset password failure counter.

Field.Name: CreateOriginator
Field.Description: The administrator or application that created the entity.

Field.Name: LastModifyOriginator
Field.Description: The administrator or application that last modified the entity.

Field.Name: CreateTimestamp
Field.Description: Defines the date and time at which the subscriber was created (GMT).

Field.Name: ModifyTimestamp
Field.Description: Defines the date and time at which the subscriber was last modified (GMT).

Field.Name: CountryCode
Field.Description: Defines the international country code (1-3 digits).

Field.Name: AllowedLanguages
Field.Description: Defines the allowed languages.

Field.Name: HandsetTypeAllowed
Field.Description: Defines a list of handset types supported for the subscriber.

Field.Name: HandsetType
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's handset type.

Field.Name: BWListInUse
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's black white list in use.

Field.Name: EmailBlackList
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's email black list.

Field.Name: EmailWhiteList
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's email white list.

Field.Name: EmailDomainBlackList
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's email domain black list.

Field.Name: EmailDomainWhiteList
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's email domain white list.

Field.Name: MailAccountEmailAddress
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's email address for this mail account.

Field.Name: MailAccountUsername
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's username for this mail account.

Field.Name: WapId
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's wap id.

Field.Name: HandsetIpAddr
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's handset IP address.

Field.Name: BillingType
Field.Description: Determines the subscriber type; either Prepaid or Postpaid.

Field.Name: BWListEnabled
Field.Description: Determines whether black and white list are enabled.

Field.Name: MailAccountPassword
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's password for this mail account.

Field.Name: BillingNumber
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's billing number written to the CDR.

Field.Name: PhoneBlackList
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's phone black list.

Field.Name: PhoneWhiteList
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's phone white list.

Field.Name: WebSelfProvEnabled
Field.Description: Determines if Web self-provisioning is enabled.

Field.Name: URI
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's URI.

Field.Name: MobileIdentifier
Field.Description: Defines the mobile identifier; either the IMSI number (GSL) or the MIN number (CDMA).

Field.Name: ShortDialNumber
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's Short Dial number.

Field.Name: AdditionalIdsNumLimit
Field.Description: Defines the maximum number of additional phone numbers allowed for the subscriber.

Field.Name: Nickname
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's nick name.

Field.Name: Gender
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's gender.

Field.Name: DateOfBirth
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's date of birth.

Field.Name: Street
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's street.

Field.Name: City
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's city.

Field.Name: Region
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's region.

Field.Name: ZipCode
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's zip code.

Field.Name: State
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's state.

Field.Name: Country
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's country.

Field.Name: PostalBox
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's postal box.

Field.Name: TuiPassword
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's password for logging in to the system from the TUI.

Field.Name: TuiPasswordChangedTime
Field.Description: The timestamp of the last time the subscriber's password was changed.

Field.Name: AdditionalIdsEnabled
Field.Description: Determines if additional IDs are supported for the subscriber.

Field.Name: HandsetLanguage
Field.Description: Defines the subscriber's handset language. This setting is stored in ISO string format (en-US) according to RFC 3066, as follows: ISO-639 two letter code; ISO-3166 two letter country code.

Field.Name: WeekendDays
Field.Description: Defines the list of weekend days.

Field.Name: NicknameEnabled
Field.Description: Determines if nickname is active for the subscriber.

Field.Name: NicknameOn
Field.Description: Determines if nickname is on for the subscriber.

Field.Name: DomainName
Field.Description: Defines the name of the domain.

Field.Name: DomainDescription
Field.Description: Defines the description of the domain.

Field.Name: CreateOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who creates the domain.

Field.Name: LastModifyOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who modified last the domain.

Field.Name: EmailDomain
Field.Description: The domain's email suffix.

Field.Name: GlobalDomainQuota
Field.Description: The global domain quota.

Field.Name: CosName
Field.Description: Defines the name of the cos.

Field.Name: CosDescription
Field.Description: Defines the description of the cos.

Field.Name: CreateOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who creates the cos.

Field.Name: LastModifyOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who modified last the cos.

Field.Name: ServiceName
Field.Description: Determines the Service Name

Field.Name: ServiceLevelName
Field.Description: Determines the Service Level Name

Field.Name: ServiceLevelName
Field.Description: Defines the name of the service level.

Field.Name: ServiceLevelDescription
Field.Description: Describes the service level.

Field.Name: CreateOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who creates the service level.

Field.Name: LastModifyOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who modified last the service level.

Field.Name: CreateTimestamp
Field.Description: Defines time stamp the service level was created.

Field.Name: ModifyTimestamp
Field.Description: Defines time stamp the service level was modify.

Field.Name: CreateOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who creates the service level.

Field.Name: LastModifyOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who modified last the service level.

Field.Name: CreateTimestamp
Field.Description: Defines time stamp the service level was created.

Field.Name: ModifyTimestamp
Field.Description: Defines time stamp the service level was modify.

Field.Name: CreateOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who creates the service level.

Field.Name: LastModifyOriginator
Field.Description: Defines the originator who modified last the service level.

Field.Name: CreateTimestamp
Field.Description: Defines time stamp the service level was created.

Field.Name: ModifyTimestamp
Field.Description: Defines time stamp the service level was modify.
